thread.section_title: EagleSaver.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of EagleSaver.com | www.eaglesaver.com
thread.title: Lisa

author: Lisa
title: Lisa
text:
I highly recommend doing business with Eagle Saver. The process was simple, they paid more than a similar company per item, & it was easy to ship. I received my check promptly, for exactly what I was Quote: d.
I appreciated their policy that if they couldn't accept a dvd/cd, they would mail it back to me, because another company I originally tried, would have just kept them & not paid you. As the "seller" you'd have no way of knowing if they were being honest or stealing your items. This company however, is very clear on their integrity & being a fair/honest buyer. Definitely recommend Eagle Saver!
